name: Agnes
description: Hello there! I am Agnes. I took up Bachelor of Science major in Biology at Cebu Normal University. Learning is a process and studying her in NVOIM in a fun and easy way is more effective for students who want to enhance their English skill. So come and join me in class. See you!
tags: Bachelor of Science Major in Biology

name: Ai
description: Hi! I am your ever passionate and enthusiastic teacher, Teacher Ai. I am a graduate from the University of Cebu Lapu Lapu and Mandaue with a degree of Bachelor of Elementary Education. English is one of the main languages which is widely used all over the world. However, for some students,the process of learning the language is not that smooth compared with what they have learnt. Nvoim teachers would make that process easier and fun. I would help you gain your confidence, improve your speaking,reading,listening and writing skills. Thank you and see you in my class.
tags: University of Cebu Lapu Lapu Mandau
Elementary Education major in General Education

name: Aizelle
description: Hi! I am teacher Aizelle. I am a jolly and energetic person. I enjoy singing, dancing, cooking and watching movies. I graduated with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education. With this, I was able to develop my patience and most especially, I have found my passion for teaching. Seeing my students achieve and reach their goals in life makes me feel glad to be part of their journey towards success. I would be very happy to be your English Teacher so I hope to see you in my class. Bye Bye!
tags: Secondary Education Major in Livelihood Education

name: Alexis
description: Hello! Learners. My name is teacher Alexis. I like dancing, watching movies, taking pictures of flowers and I love being in beaches, enjoying my time and watching the sunset. I graduated at University of Cebu Main Campus with the degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in General Science. I have a varied experience in ESL teaching and I have worked with diverse learners. I enjoy teaching and exploring the vast world of the English language. I hope to share it with you! See you in my class.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education in General Science

name: Alexza
description: Hello! Iam teacher Alexa, a graduate of Bohol Island State University with a degree in Bachelo or Secondary Education, majoring in Social Studies. As an organized, innovative, and passionate educator, I believe language skills are key to global connections. Join NVOIM and discover English in an engaging, creative and interactive way. I look forward to seeing you in my class
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Social Studies

name: Aly
description: Hello everyone! I am teacher Aly! Do you know that you can learn while having fun? Yes. Of course. I have been teaching for almost a year now, and I could say that I really love teaching kids and adults like you. So what are you waiting for? Enroll now and be my student here at NVOIM. Teacher Aly is waiting for you. See you!

name: Amor(P)
description: Hi! I am Teacher Amor. The role of a teacher is to inspire, motivate, and educate learners. I have been working in this field for 4 years now. I am used to engaging with various students and letting them feel appreciated upon doing their tasks for I know it will help them show their confidence and passion in learning. Learn more and have fun while learning. Join NVOIM now!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Eduction Major in Math

name: Andi
description: Hello lovely students! I am Andi and I ve been handling diverse learners with different levels for many years. Throughout my career, I ve proven my passion and dedication in teaching. It s always been a great achievement for me whenever I see my students improve their skills and explore the world of English. I am so excited to study and have fun with you in my class. See yah!

name: Angel(P)
description: Hi! I am Angel. I graduated with a Bachelor of Science in Home Technology Education. I am a licensed teacher, and I also have more than 5 years of experience. Teaching has always been my passion. I enjoy working with students of all levels, helping and guiding them to become confident and competent users of the English language. I make sure that my classes are interactive and informative. So let us learn English in a fun and easy way.
tags: Bachelor of Science in Home Technology Education

name: Anna
description: Hi! I am teacher Ana. I took up bachelor of Science in tourism management. I had an experience teaching kids and adults with other nationalities and I can say that it was really fun. I enjoy reading English books and watching educational shows. So if you want to learn and enhance your English speaking skills , come and join me in my class. See you!

name: Annabel
description: I am teacher Annabel. I graduated from the University of the Visayas-Mandaue and took up Bachelor of Elementary Education-General Education. I had worked as an ESL teacher at Glant Academy. I also worked as a developmental teacher in PH-907 Mt. Olives. I am active, cheerful, energetic, and kind with a pleasing personality. I am a committed and dedicated teacher and have a passion for teaching. Nowadays, English is the official global language. As a teacher, I am willing to help my students learn and know more about English to become globally competitive. I promise that I will do my best to help you achieve your goals in NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Education

name: Annie
description: Hello there! I am teacher Annie. I have been an ESL teacher for 5 years both offline and online. I have a passion for teaching so I see to it that my class is always friendly, informative, and interesting. My interest is reading books. It helps me improve my knowledge and communication skills. I cannot wait to have a class with you at Nvoim. See you in my class!
tags: Business Management major in Computer Programming

name: Antonette
description: Good day! My name is Antonnette. I graduated at Cebu Technological University wherein I took up Bachelor of Elementary Education. I am a positive person and very hardworking to achieve my goals. I am an easygoing person and friendly too. For me, teaching English is not just a job and passion, but it is about helping and motivating students to have courage in learning. Seeing my students improve their English skills is fulfilling. I can assure you that your speaking skills will enhance in just a short period of time, especially if there will be cooperation and involvement in your part. By having self confidence and dedication in studying English, you will be successful. What are you waiting for? Be part of our NVOIM Family! I will be glad to see you!
tags: Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education

name: Aubrey
description: Hi there! I am teacher Aubrey, an enthusiastic teacher with a passion for helping students unlock the joy of learning English. I am a licensed teacher with a degree in Bachelor of Elementary Education. I have been teaching English online for almost two years. I have taught learners of all ages and levels, and my lessons are always interactive and full of energy. Whether you want to improve your speaking skills, build confidence, or explore new cultures through language. I am here to guide you every step of the way. Come join me and we will make learning English an exciting adventure together!
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education

name: Autumn
description: Hi! I am Autumn. I have always been passionate about sharing my knowledge and inspiring young minds like yours. I believe that education is the key to unlocking your full potential and I am excited to embark on this learning journey with you. With passion and dedication, we can achieve incredible things with respect. So what are you waiting for? Join and study wth us.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Values Education

name: Aya
description: Hi! I am Aya. I am fond of listening to music and watching movies. I also enjoy learning and teaching the language. I want both of us to have fun while learning and unlocking the world of the English Language and here at NVOIM, I and the rest of the teachers promise to make learning the language very fun and enjoyable thing to do. I am a friendly and a very funny teacher so I hope to see you all in my class.! Have a very nice day!

name: Ayessa
description: Hello, my lovely students! I am Ayessa. I took up Bachelors in Secondary Education Major in English. I enjoy teaching kids and teenagers in our church, and talking to them is a good opportunity to practice my speaking skills. I believe that learning English is a process, and committing mistakes is part of it. So, do not worry because I am here to help you improve your English skills. We will have a fun and interactive class together! See you in my class!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Belle
description: Hi, my name is Belle and I am a jolly person. I graduated with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English. After that, I started working as a teacher and was able to handle Senior High Students. From that, I was able to improve my patience and found my passion in teaching. I really love teaching kids by seeing them achieving their goals and I am happy as I am one of the reasons of their success. Thank you and see you soon in my class. Bye!

name: Bernice
description: Hello! I am teacher Bernice. I studied Interior Designing at University of San Carlos, but teaching is my passion since I was young. Im a Sunday school teacher and I love my students. I am not just your teacher, but a very good and loving friend, too. We can share secrets, interests, laughters and even sad moments. Just call me, and I ll be there right away! Learning and speaking English is totally fun! We will explore the English world and discover new things together! Welcome to NVOIM!
tags: University of San Carlos - Talamban Campus
Bachelor of Fine Arts Major in Interior Design

name: Betty(P)
description: Good day to you! I am teacher Betty and I am pleased to meet you! I majored in Mathematics and graduated from Cebu Normal University. As for my teaching experiences, I have taught English for me nearly four years in total. I taught different kinds of learners from varied nationalities. For many, learning English could be challenging, however, it is also exciting. So, choose NVOIM to be part of your English journey!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Mathematics

name: Casey
description: Hello! Im Casey. I hold a Bachelor of Science degree in Management and am a certified English as a Foreign Language (TEFL) teacher. Ive been teaching English for over ten years, working with students from diverse backgrounds and language levels. I take great pride in my students progress and am always honored to be part of their journey toward academic or professional success. Patience and encouragement are at the heart of my teaching style, and I strive to create a supportive environment where learning is both effective and enjoyable. Im looking forward to seeing you in class!

name: Caster
description: Hello! My name is Caster and I am an English teacher for 7 years. I love reading books, exploring history, and watching historical movies, which often inspire how I teach. Learning English is important because it opens doors to better opportunities, helps connect with people around the world and gives access to new and more diverse learning. As a teacher, my goal is to create a supportive and engaging environment for my students. I focus on improving their confidence in speaking, writing, and understanding English through practical exercises and meaningful conversations. I look forward to seeing my students progress, achieve their goals, and enjoy the process of learning. Let’s learn together and make this journey rewarding!

name: Cee
description: Do more, have more, in order to be more. I am Teacher Cee. I graduated from Surigao del Norte State University- Malimono Campus with the degree of Bachelor of Elementary Education major in General Content. I worked as a private tutor before and developed a love for teaching. Learning English opens the door to opportunities and discoveries of more things. So if you want to know more and unlock your full potential learning English will be your first step. I cannot wait to see you in class.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Content

name: Chariss
description: Greetings! I am Teacher Chariss. I took up Bachelor of Secondary Education - Major in English. I had an experience in teaching English in both local and foreign students. In my free time, I love to read English books, novels, literature and fan fictions. I always love reading because I want to keep learning something new. Because for me, learning is living. Learning English can be easy if you have hard work, dedication and ambition. Join us here in NVOIM and see it for yourself.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education - Major in English

name: Charry
description: Knowing another language is like having another soul. Hello! I am Teacher Charry. I graduated from Cebu Technological University-Tuburan Campus with a degree in Bachelor of Elementary Education. I am a kind of teacher who is patient, caring, and creative. I believe English is a powerful tool that helps us connect with people, opens opportunities, and builds confidence. As your ESL teacher, I promise to make learning English simple, fun, and meaningful. Together, let us turn English into your key to a brighter future.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education

name: Chaty
description: Hello there! I am Teacher Chaty. I studied Bachelor of Secondary Education major in Technology and Livelihood Education at Cebu Technological University. Teaching is really my passion because I am happy to see my students learn from me and at the same time I also learn from them. So I am looking forward to seeing you in my class!
tags: Secondary Education Major in Livelihood Education

name: Chen
description: Hi! I am teacher Chen. I am a passionate teacher and I am willing to guide you in your English learning journey. I strive to make our class more interactive, fun, and informative. So come and join my class! Let us make English and enjoyable experience together. See you in class!
tags: Bachelor in Technology and Livelihood Education

name: Cherry
description: Good day! I am teacher Cherry, a Cebu Normal Univeristy- Medellin Campus, elementary education graduate. I have been teaching students to develop their English skills at all levels, from beginner to advanced. If you want to improve and speak like a native speaker. I am here to help you be better at expressing yourself. I also love teaching children and I make sure that every class is fun and exciting. And the best part is, every students gets to speak English as much as they want. Because, I am here to help you understand English better. So, come and e a part of our growing family here at NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Content Education

name: Claire
description: Good day. This is teacher Claire from NVOIM. I have earned my degree in Bachelor of Secondary Education in 2017. Teaching has been my passion since I was young. I love teaching children. Imparting knowledge to my students has never been a problem. Hence, it has helped me grow as a person. I could never imagine life without my students. I have learned to cherish every second with them. Here in NVOIM, you do not only gain English skills but also a good relationship with diverse backgrounds. Thank you!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Filipino

name: Daisy
description: Hi! I am Teacher Daisy. I am a teacher by profession and Ive been teaching English for many years. I know that learning English is very challenging but I am here to guide and help you learn English in a fun, easy and interesting way. I hope see you in my class soon - bye!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Danielle
description: Hi lovely students! I am Danielle! I am a teacher by profession and my major is English. My hobbies are writing and reading English fiction stories. I also like watching English series and movies like supernatural. For me, learning English is a key to different doors and opportunities. It also prepares you for the modern world. I can help you polish your English skills by engaging in more fun and interactive lessons. I can also help you stimulate your curiosity in the language. I look forward to seeing you in my class. See you!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Dell
description: Hi!!! I am Dell. How are you? I hope you are well. Let me tell you about myself. I am an ESL teacher for one year and nine months. I am hardworking and kind. When in terms of patience. I have great patience because teaching is my passion.
tags: Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education

name: Drei
description: Hi! I am Teacher Drei. I graduated from Villaflores College. Teaching is my passion and I believe that teaching is a noble profession because it plays a crucial role in shaping the future of society. So what are you waiting for? Come and learn with us. See you soon!
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Content

name: Elfie
description: Hello, my name is Elfie, and I~m so excited to meet you! I am a willpower athlete, optimistic person, and I am hungry to learn more about English language too. I like to travel in different places and I love watch English and Korean movies. I believe that learning has no ending. It~s immeasurable. As what Gandhi said ~Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever~. Therefore, you can enjoy living in the moment, but remember that learning English will prepare you for the future. Teaching is one of my passion. In this way, I will be able to inspire other people with different culture to learn what I have learned from other people or on my previous job. I am ready to prepare you for your future only if you are ready enough? Are you ready? Looking forward to meet you soon.
tags: Bachelor of Science Major in Office Administration

name: Ellie
description: Hi! I am Ellie! a graduate of Mater Dei College. My teaching experience while I was in University helped me a lot to become a patient and understanding teacher. With that, experience I can fully assure you that I will be able to help you every step of the way. Let us learn together and be friends as well. See you in class
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Values Education

name: Emerry
description: Hi! I am Teacher Emerry! I graduated with a degree in Elementary Education major in general content. One of the things that you should know about me is that I am a licensed professional teacher with teaching experience in both community and private schools. With the experience I gained valuable knowledge, skills, and strategies in handling students with different backgrounds. Learning English for me is very important because it helps us to communicate better. Let us embark on this language journey together and unlock new possibilities
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Content Education

name: Emily
description: Hello! My name is EMILY. I love teaching because I want to help children achieve their best. I also love watching students discover new things and witnessing those moments when students start to understand the things they didnt know before. I hope to see you in my class. You will enjoy learning English with me!
tags: Fine Arts major in Interior Design

name: Eric(M)
description: Hello students! My name is Eric. I am an Engineering graduate and I worked as a Mechanical Engineer for over 20 years, and as a Sunday school teacher and tutor for the past three years. ‎During my free time, I like reading history books, watching comedy TV series, and historical documentaries. ‎ ‎We now live in a world where People from different countries and cultures can easily communicate with each other through technology. And English is acknowledged as THE global language. ‎ ‎As a teacher, I could help you learn English by creating a supportive, encouraging, and fun environment, where we would both enjoy our learning sessions. ‎ ‎I am looking forward to meeting you. And I am excited to see you progress in your English skills.

name: Eva
description: Hi Im Eva! I find great pleasure in spending time at the park, and I have a deep appreciation for music. I also like exploring new food. I find fulfillment in helping students improve their English skills. I have had the privilege of guiding my students to speak English better for over 12 years, so, I can lead you to a whole new world of fun and learning experience. I am dedicated and passionate about helping students reach their language goals. I enjoy teaching conversational English, and I can help you do better in this area. If you are afraid to use English ,no worries..I am here to support and coach so you can be comfortable in taking risks to use English. I look forward to getting to know you. Let us study together!

name: Fatima
description: Hello Students, I am Fatima, a graduate of Bachelor of Secondary Education and a Licensed Professional Teacher. Watching movies is one of my hobbies. I also love singing and especially teaching. Learning English is fun and interesting because you will ll learn a lot of words and useful expressions. So, I am here to help you enhance your writing, listening, speaking and communication skills using the English language. I am looking forward to seeing you in my class!

name: Fay
description: Hi ! I am Fay. I took up BAchelor of Elementary Education. I do believe in this, "Do not train children to learning by force and harshness, but direct them to it by what amuses their minds, so that you may be better able to discover with accuracy the peculiar bent of the genius of each." -Plato Here in NVOIM we do not just teach students but we nurture and encourage them to boost their self-confidence and be more successful by learning English in a fun way. :)
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Home Economics and Livelihood Education

name: Flor
description: Hi students! I am Flor, a licensed professional teacher. I have been in the teaching industry for almost 7 years. I like learning new skills and recently, I have been interested in exploring sign language for the deaf. Learning English makes our brain stronger and more versatile. It is not only useful, but it also gives a lot of satisfaction and making progress that will make you feel great. I am looking forward to seeing you here at NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in Mathematics

name: Genevieve
description: Hello I am Teacher Genevieve. Teaching English is one of the things I enjoy the most. In my class, I work with enthusiasm and positivity. It gives me joy meeting learners around the world so I look forward to speaking with you soon.
tags: University of Cebu Lapu-lapu and Mandaue
Bachelor of Secondary Education-Major in English

name: Gerda
description: Hi! I am Teacher Gerda a graduate of Cebu Technological University-Carmen Campus with the Degree of Bachelor of Elementary Education. I am friendly and dedicated person. I love to teach and share my knowledge to my students. Learning English is a work in progress. It can help to communicate and build a relationship to others. Because I believe that in learning it can be fun and at the same time we learn.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education

name: Ghandi
description: Hello, students! I am Teacher Ghandi, a graduate of the Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Science. My hobbies include listening to English music and watching TV shows. Learning English increases career opportunities and helps connect with diverse people. I will help you improve your English skills by incorporating real-life conversations and continuously supporting you. I am excited to meet you all soon!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Gia
description: Hello students! My name is Gia. I took up a Bachelor of Education Major in English. I I have been teaching ESL for quite a long time. I like watching English movies during my free time and I also like to listen to English songs. Learning English is hard but with the right approach and strategies in teaching, anyone can learn English easily. I am certain that I can help you learn and speak in English with confidence. So, I hope you will give me the opportunity to teach amazing students like you. Thank you and see you in my class!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Gie
description: Hello there, I am Gie. A licensed professional teacher. I have been teaching for almost three years in one of the schools here in the Philippines. I taught diverse students. So seeing them learn, grow, and improve their English language makes me happy. So if you are interested, come and join me in my class. I will be happy to see and study with you soon.
tags: Central Bicol State University of Agriculture

name: Grace
description: Hello, lovely students! My name is Grace. I took up a Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English. One of my hobbies is reading webtoon because I love their stories and beautiful animations. For me, learning English opens up a world of opportunities for communication and personal growth making it an important skill in todays globalized society. As a teacher, I would implement interactive and immersive activities to enhance my students English skills while fostering a supportive and engaging class. Again, Im Grace, and Im looking forward to seeing you in my class.
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Grachelle
description: Hi there! I am Grachelle, your English teacher. Learning a new language can be both exciting and challenging and I am here to make learning English fun and easy. I am here to guide you every step of the way on this journey. In my class, I make sure that the students feel heard and understood. I cannot wait to get to know each of you and help you achieve your language goals. Let us start this exciting journey together!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English

name: Han
description: "What we learn is part of who we are"Hi there! I am teacher Han. I took up Bachelor in Industrial Technology major in computer. I assure you that with me you will learn English Language in a very exciting way, where learning is not just studying but making friends and having fun. So, see you.
tags: Bachelor in industrial technology major in computer technology

name: Hazey
description: Hello! I am teacher Hazey! I was a grade school teacher who had the opportunity to teach various subjects. Acquiring proficiency in English provides numerous job opportunities and facilitates global communication. With that, I can assure you that I can be a big help toward your goal of learning English. I am excited to finally meet you in class.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education

name: Hyacinth(P)
description: Learning English is fun! Hi, my name is Hyacinth. I graduated with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English. I have experienced working as a teacher, and I was able to teach kids and adults. Do you want to improve your vocabulary and speak like a native English speaker while having fun? Come and enroll in my class. See you
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English

name: Imee
description: Hello! I am Imee! I graduated from the University of Pasig with a degree in Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English. I received different academic awards in school like the Dean s Lister and President Lister. Before I graduated, I was blessed to receive the Outstanding Student Teacher award during my on-the-job training. I like teaching because it has been my dream ever since I was a little girl, and now I am slowly turning my dream into reality. Struggles and hardships may come along but it is a challenge to become the person you want to be. I am looking forward to meeting you and hope to see you soon in my class!

name: Irene
description: Hello I am Teacher Irene! I know English can be difficult and boring, but I will do my best to make it as enjoyable as possible. I really love teaching and it is my passion to teach and help my students learn something in which he/she finds it difficult. We can talk about anything under the sun. I hope to see you in my class!

name: Isabel
description: Hi! I am teacher Isabel a graduate from Cebu Technological University-Carmen Campus with the degree of Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Content Education. I really love everything that I do in relation to teaching. I am always motivated and committed to helping students make progress and become confident and productive on their own. Teaching is not that easy, but I do believe that loving everything you do will make your work progressive and effective. So let us enjoy everything and have fun teaching and learning.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Educationmajor in content Education

name: Isla
description: To learn a language is to have one more window from which to look at the world. Hi! I am Isla but you can call me teacher Isla. I am a fresh graduate from Cebu Normal University with a degree of Bachelor of Arts in Communication major in Broadcast Journalism. I believe that learning English is an open door that will allow us to communicate effectively with the people from all over the world.
tags: Bachelor of Arts in Communication Major in Broadcast Journalism

name: Iya
description: Hi there! Im Teacher Iya. I have been teaching English for a couple of years now. And, I do love to see my students learn English and enjoy my class at the same time. So come and join me as we explore the English Language and experience the fun and excitement of studying here at NVOIM. See you soon, students!

name: Iyrra
description: Hi! I am teacher Iyrra. I graduated at the University of the Visayas with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education. Why did I choose this kind of path? it is simply because teaching is my passion. Teaching is really what I want to do and what I love to do. Teaching will be forever part of my life. As a teacher, I always make sure that my student will learn something. Learning while having fun is my goal. Therefore, I am a passionate and hardworking kind of teacher. I am looking forward to seeing you in my class. Thank you!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Music, Arts, Physical Education, and Health

name: Jackie
description: Hello everyone! My name is Jackie! I have been teaching English for five years, and I hold a Bachelors degree in Elementary Education. Teaching has always been my passion, and one of my biggest interests is helping students communicate with confidence through English. I believe learning English is not just about grammar and vocabulary; it is about building confidence and using English in real life. That is why I teach my students based on the way they learn best, whether it’s through speaking, listening, or practice. So if you want to improve your English in a supportive and effective way, I would love to help you. Come and join my class. Let us learn together!

name: Jacky
description: Hi, there! I am Teacher Jacky. I graduated from Lapu-Lapu City College. I took up a Bachelor of Secondary Education major in Filipino. Learning English is difficult, but no worries. Let us learn English with ease and fun. If you have the determination in life everything will go smoothly. Just keep going and believe in yourself. Never stop learning because life never stops teaching. Book in my class. See you there!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in Filipino

name: Jaezelle
description: Hello! My name is Teacher Jaezelle. I am an education graduate and I have experienced handling diverse students with different ages and grade levels. I am very passionate in teaching because I love sharing my knowledge and helping my students in achieving their goals. I am very patient and considerate for I believe that teachers must empathize with students, respect them and believe that each one has something special that can be built upon. I am looking forward to celebrating your small and big progress. Hope to see you soon!

name: Jai
description: Hi! I am teacher Jai. I believe that you should need to have objectives in every goal that you want to achieve. Life is full of opportunities so do not be afraid to learn new things like English. If you want to learn more, come and join in my class for I will do my best to help you. See you!!
tags: Secondary Education Major in Livelihood Education

name: Jaima
description: Hi! I am teacher Jaima. I graduated college from Royal Christian College with the degree of Bachelor in Elementary Education Major in General Content. I am a very patient teacher who believes that English takes effort to learn. See you in class!
tags: Elementary Education Major in General Education

name: Jamaica
description: Hi! I am Teacher Jamaica. I studied at the University of Cebu-Main with a degree of Bachelor of Arts major in Psychology. For me, learning the English language is like riding a roller coaster. At first, you are afraid to ride it but when you get used to it, you will realize how fun it is. Just like learning the English language, at first you would be afraid to learn because you think you will just make a mistake but when you get used to it, it will be easier for you to learn it, understand it and make use of it in your daily life. As an NVOIM teacher, my goal is to help the students enhance their communication skills and also to understand what the students want. In NVOIM, you will learn a lot and of course. We will help you to be a better one. Again, this is teacher Jamaica. I hope to see you in my class. Have a nice day.
tags: Bachelor of Arts Major in Psychology

name: Janvee
description: Hi, I am teacher Janvee. I am a friendly and passionate teacher. My dream is to help my students achieve their dreams into reality. I will help you gain your confidence in speaking, reading and listening. So what are you waiting for, come and join in my class and be a part of our NVOIM family.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Content

name: Jas
description: Hi, Good day! My name is Jas. I am a graduate of Bachelor in Elementary Education at Sibonga Community College. I am a dedicated, optimistic, and goal-driven teacher. I have been teaching English to diverse learners since 2019. Being an English as a Second Language (ESL) teacher ensures students develop an understanding and gives students the practical ability to use the language.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education - Major in General Education

name: Jason(M)
description: Are you ready to improve your English confidence? Are you looking for a teacher who is warm, attentive, dynamic and passionate? Our classes together will be exciting, full of fun, and interesting! I am Jason, and I have been teaching English for over 10 years now. Let us start the fun! See you in my class^^

name: Jel
description: Hi! I am teacher Jel! I love teaching with great passion and energy. I have been sharing my enthusiasm for English for more than a year now. I have taught English to young students and adults of different nationalities. Would you like to study English with me? I will be very glad to meet you soon in class.

name: Jelly
description: I welcome you here in NVOIM. ^ ^ I am teacher Jelly. I graduated from the University of Cebu-LM, with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English. I have been teaching English to Korean students for almost 7 years now. And I find it fun in teaching them. Let us have fun while learning English here in NVOIM... ^ ^
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English

name: Jenny
description: Hi, I am Jenny. I graduated from AMA Computer Learning Center major in Computer Graphics and Animation. I experienced teaching Koreans from other company with different levels of English communication skills. I know that English can be difficult but I assure you that it is very interesting and useful language. We can talk about anything and everything here at Nvoim. See you in my class.

name: Jerry
description: Hi! I am Teacher Jerry, Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world. Let us learn the universal language which is English. Here in NVOIM English Corporation, we provide fun, interactive, and quality education. So, what are you waiting for? Come and Join Us!
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Major in General Education

name: Jesiel
description: Hello! I am Teacher Jesiel and I graduated from Cebu Technological University- Main Campus with a degree of Bachelor of Technical Vocational Teacher Education Major in Food and Service Management. In teaching, I am passionate, kind and I always make sure that my students can feel comfort during classes. I taught grade schoolers before and it was an amazing experience. It makes me more eager to teach and help students. And here in NVoim, we teach English not just to help students learn but also to make them more inspire to study well and can feel the essence of belongingness.
tags: Bachelor of Technical Vocational Teacher Education_ Major in Food and Service Management

name: Jewel
description: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream. Hi everyone! I am teacher Jewel. I graduated with a degree of Bachelor of Education major in General Education at Cordova Public College. I have been teaching ESL for a year and a half. Learning English is fun. You are not only going to learn it but also you will also understand why it is considered as the first language in almost every country. You will love its complexity and a lot more. If you are having difficulties in English. No beggie. I am here to help you to develop your English speaking skills.
tags: Elementary Education Major in General Education

name: Jhonny(M)
description: Hi! Iam Teacher Johnny a graduate with a degree of Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in Science from CTU- Main Campus. I am an optimistic person and a passionate teacher. Challenging yet fullfiling. I believe that learning English gives us better opportunities. It also helps us to express ourselves and communicate better with each other. I would love to impart my knowledge about English. So, I hope to see you in my class. See you!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education-Major in Science

name: Jill
description: Hi! My name is Jill. I am your passionate and committed teacher. Learning English is difficult but, with patience and perseverance, you will surely reach your destination. I would be very happy to be your English Teacher. I am looking forward to meeting you in my class.
tags: University of Cebu Lapu Lapu Mandau

name: Jing
description: Hi! I am Teacher Jing Nice to meet you. Nice to meet you too. English is fun. English is good. So, what are you waiting for. Stand Up! Get Up! Take a walk! Bring your big smile and come with us. It is mine, it is yours, it is our chance, to connect, to be connected through what we call English.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English

name: Jochelle
description: One of the most well-known philosophers once said You will learn something by doing it. Hi! I am your Teacher Jochelle a recent elementary education graduate with a focus on content instruction. I completed my studies at the San Francisco Campus of Cebu Technological University. Again, this is your teacher Jochelle saying, Let us Learn and have fun while studying English together! Enroll in NVOIM and learn with me! See you!
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Content

name: Joshua(M)
description: Hi, I am Teacher Joshua. I graduated with a degree in Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Special Education and Technological Livelihood Education. I do believe that the secret of life is enjoying the passage of time, and the everyday lesson you have learned from it. Here at NVOIM, we will guide you to bring out the best of you. This is for you to have a core in English Language and speak English fluently too. Together we will achieve that in a fun and enjoyable way for you to show your full potential in Speaking English confidently. We are going to make it exciting and meaningful to build a better you.
tags: Elementary Education Major in Special Education

name: Joy
description: Hi. I am joy. I love reading novels and it is one of the reasons why I learned English. I also like watching online and western series. Personally, learning English is essential nowadays; English is not easy to learn and cannot be learned overnight, continuous practice of what you have learned is a must. Reading together and having a conservation with someone while correcting their English lapses is one of the ways I use to help them learn. I will help you practice conversing in English and at the same time learn the right words to use during the conversation. With that being said, I am looking forward to having classes with you!

name: Jucyl
description: Hello, I am Jucyl. I graduated from Cebu Technological University Main Campus. I took up a Bachelor of Technology and Livelihood Education major in Home Economics. I am patient, kind, and persistent. I believe learning English is important for communication since it is a universal language. So, come with me as we learn here at NVOIM. See you
tags: Bachelor of Technology and Livelihood Education Major in Home Economicsd

name: Judy
description: Hi! I am Teacher Judy. I took Bachelor of Science in Information Systems. I love reading books and meeting people. I like learning about Korean culture, too. I like seeing my students learn something from me. I have been teaching English to students with different levels for more than 6 years, so I would like to share my skills with you, too. Do you want to take your skills to the next level? Study with us at NVOIM! See you there!

name: Karren
description: Hi! I am Teacher Karren. Teaching is one of the things I like doing. I am excited to guide you in learning the English language to improve your communication skills so you could communicate more confidently and effectively. I look forward to teaching you in the most fun and easiest way possible. I hope to see you all, in my class. Have a good day!
tags: Bachelor of Arts major in English

name: Kate
description: Hello there! I am Teacher Kate, and I graduated with a degree in Bachelor of Elementary Education. I have a teaching license with four years of teaching experience. I am passionate about continuing to teach and helping you learn more about the English language. In my free time, I enjoy watching movies and TV shows to gain more knowledge that I can share with my class. I also love to listen to music and sing. So, come and learn with me. Let us make English fun and easy! See you soon!

name: Kathryn
description: Good day! I am teacher Kathryn. I graduated Bachelor of Elementary Education major in General Education from Cebu Normal University. I have experienced working as an ESL camp teacher (offline). I also tried working as a substitute teacher in a private school. I am patient enough. As a teacher, I am capable of dealing with other people and do the best I can in teaching. I will try my best to meet up your expectations and goal with me here at NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General Education

name: Kattlia
description: Hi! My name is Kattlia. Teaching requires passion and patience. It is essential to build a good relationship with students, so I want to assure you that you are in a conducive learning environment where you do not have to worry much. Rather, it gives you excitement to learn more. I am thrilled to see you. I will definitely wait for you! See you!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Mathematics

name: Kaye
description: Hi! I am teacher Kaye. I know everyone wants to learn English in order to communicate and express your thoughts easily. What are you waiting for? Enroll here in NVOIM now! I will help you enhance your speaking skills. See you and have a great day!

name: Kiah
description: Hi! I am teacher Kiah. I graduated at Cebu Technological University Carmen Campus and took up Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education. Itis not only about grammar or making better sentences but it is also about chances to speak up and to be heard by others. Come and learn with me. See you!
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Content Education

name: Klien
description: When you acknowledge your potential, you are doing yourself a big favor of reaching your dreams. Hi! This is Teacher Klien! English may seem complicated but we will help you get to prove that you have that excellent potential in communication. You will reach your dreams in no time so see you in my class!

name: Kreeshia
description: Hi! My name is Kreeshia! I love reading, watching series, traveling especially on the beach, and communicating with other people. Teaching is really my passion because through this I can share my knowledge. And sharing my knowledge to my students is really satisfying for me. Seeing them learn and improve really makes me happy. When I was young, I was able to practice my teaching skills in my 3 younger brothers because in my free time, I tutor them in their lessons. So, if you want to learn a lot about English, come and join me in my class. I am so excited to teach and talk to you. Hope to see you soon my future students!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Kris
description: Hi! I am teacher Kris! I earned a degree in Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English. I was able to teach various students before and I am excited to teach here at NVOIM. As your teacher, I will also help you acheive that so you could also experience the beauty of communicating through the use of English lanaguage. I am very excited to see you in my class
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Lara
description: A good teacher knows each student is special and can learn at their own pace. Hello there! I am Teacher Lara. I give high respect towards my student and I am passionate in my work. See you in my class!
tags: University of Cebu- Lapulapu and Mandaue
Bachelor of Science Major in Accountancy

name: Leigh
description: Hi! I am teacher Leigh. I finished my studies at Cebu Technological University-Tuburan Campus with a degree of Bachelor of Secondary Education major in Home Economics Technology. name: Lem
description: Hello, I am Teachers Lem! Teaching does not guarantee financial security. But for me, I enjoy teaching because it is a fulfilling challenge. Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English

name: Lency
description: Hello everyone! I am Lency, and I took a Bachelors degree in Secondary Education with a major in English. My hobbies are watching documentaries, listening to podcasts, and reading books. I have a deep passion for teaching, particularly because I love transmitting knowledge and nurturing others in the use of the English language. I find English both challenging and rewarding, especially when discovering new words. Ultimately, my goal is to help you gain confidence and mastery, guiding you from the basics to proficiency. I am driven by the desire to teach with passion. I look forward to learning and growing with you, and I’m excited about the experiences ahead. See you in my class!
tags: University of Rizal System Cainta Campus
Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Let
description: Hi there! I am Let. Nice to meet you all. It would be fun to talk about you and the things you like. I hope you enjoy every minute of our class and learn a lot. There is no harm in trying. So come on, practice English with me and be more confident in using the language. See you soon.

name: Levy(P)
description: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you. Good day everyone! I am Levy, a graduate of Bachelor in Elementary Education major in General Education. name: Lian

name: Lin
description: Hi, I am Teacher Lin! I took up Bachelor of Science in Elementary Education, Major in General Content at the University of Cebu Lapu-Lapu and Mandaue. name: Linn
description: Hi! This is Teacher Linn. I am a graduate of 4 year course, major in English. I love imparting knowledge to students cause it is my fashion to teach. description: Hello there! I am Teacher Lorraine. I graduated from Cebu Technological University with a Bachelors degree of Elementary Education major in Special Education. name: Lory
description: Hi! I am Teacher Lory. I am from Lapu-Lapu City. I graduated in Cebu Technological University-Main campus with a Bachelors Degree in Elementary Education major in Pre-school. name: Lyca
description: Hi, good day! I am Lyca. I am 23 years old. I graduated from Cebu Technological University with a degree of Bachelor in Elementary Education. I am patient, kind, and considerate. Begin your journey in learning English! VOIM English Corp is just here for you!

name: Lyra
description: Hi, I am Teacher Lyra. I am a licensed educator with a Bachelor of Arts degree in English, majoring in English Language Studies as a discipline. I would love to help the learners by teaching English in a fun and interactive way.

name: Lyza
description: A heart of a good teaching is the heart of a good teacher. Hello and welcome to NVOIM. Allow me to introduce myself. I am teacher Lyza. name: Madel
description: Hi I am Madel. I have been teaching here at NVOIM for quite a long time now. Teaching is and will always be my passion. description: Hello I am Maggie I took up Mass Communication Major in Advertising and I have been teaching Koreans for almost 10 years now. description: Hello there! I am Ronalyn Magsino and you can call me teacher Rona. I took up Bachelor of Science in Industrial Education major in Industrial Arts and I am now a Licensed Professional Teacher. Teaching is my passion so I volunteered as a Sunday School teacher in our church. During my spare time, I read books and watch movies and series on Netflix. I believe that learning english should be an enjoyable journey. Im passionate in helping you improve your language skills in a fun and engaging way. Whether youre looking to boost your conversation skills, refine your grammar, or prepare for exams, Im here to help you in every step of the way and I cant wait to embark on this journey together. So, see you here at NVOIM!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in Industrial Arts

name: Rosean
description: Annyeong everyone, Im teacher Rosean of NVOIM Corp. taking up the course Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management from Cebu, Philippines. Are you having a hard time speaking and understanding the English language? Or are you interested in learning the English language? If Yes, then Ill be glad to teach you everything that you need to learn to help you understand and at the same time enjoy our class in different ways of learning the English language. It may be difficult for you to understand everything but Im going to make sure that you will learn a lot and have fun in our class so come join us now here in NVOIM Corp.
tags: Bachelor of Science in Hotel and Restaurant Management

name: Roselyn
description: Hi, I am Roselyn Your friendly and devoted teacher. Teaching has always been my passion. From the very first moment, I start to build trust with my students by helping them learn to speak English so that they can communicate confidently in a manageable way. Hope to see you in my class!:)
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in PEHM

name: Sam
description: Hi! My name is Sam. I love learning new things and I enjoy learning different cultures and meeting new people. In fact, making friends is one of my best skills. I will always make sure that my students will feel comfortable in my class. I am also here to develop your English skills both reading and oral guaranteed that I will be your great assistance. I will make our classes as lively as possible, and we can even be friends. What are you waiting for? Enroll now here in NVOIM. See you in my class!
tags: Bachelor of Technical Education Major in Food Service Management

name: Sandino(M)
description: Hello students! I am teacher Sandino! I took up AB Mass Communication back in college. I have experience in teaching English to students of different levels. I am an artist and I love performing. I enjoy singing and composing music. English is a universal language, and you will go far in life if you know how to speak English. I will help you improve your English skills and use different teaching strategies in class. We will have fun in my class, and I am looking forward to seeing you!

name: Savannah
description: Hi, I am teacher Savannah. I graduated from Cebu Normal University last June 2022. I took up the degree of Bachelor of Arts major in Filipino. I am passionate, kind, and a work harder type of person. I love to teach in a fun and interactive way. Currently, I am a volunteer at a Non-Government Organization (NGO) based in Germany, so that I can develop myself more and have more confidence. Here at NVoim we develop students to become more competitive. So, come and learn with me. See you!

name: Sha
description: Hi! I am Teacher Sha. Do you want to study English in fun and easy way? Good choice! Because here in NVOIM, we provide a fun and interactive way for children and adults to learn English at the convenience of their homes. It is our mission to develop a competitive and competent English speaking people. So, what are you waiting for? Come and join us here in NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education- Major in English

name: Shane
description: Hello students! My name is Shane. I took up bachelors degree in secondary education. I love reading, watching English movies, and also teaching; that is why I took that as my profession. Learning English is important as it is the universal language used by everyone, making communication easier and providing students with access to a vast array of translated books, journals, and articles. I will be cheerful, genuine, and sincere in teaching my students. I will also encourage you to express your ideas and thoughts and help you be confident in speaking English. I am excited to be a part of your English journey. See yah
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in Science

name: Sheden
description: My name is Sheden! I graduated from Mandaue City College with a degree in Education, majoring in general content. I am an enthusiastic teacher and passionate about helping students build their confidence and skills in language. As a teacher, I aim to create engaging lessons that cater to different learning styles and students levels of understanding. Learning English should be meaningful and enjoyable. Let us learn together and be part of the growing family.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education major in Content Education

name: Shell
description: Hello I am teacher Shell I took up Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in English. My hobbies are painting and drawing. I also like teaching my students how to speak and write using the English language. So come and study with us because NVOIM English is a learning program that gives you fun and effective ways in learning English. Rest assured that you will become confident and competent in speaking the English language, so see you in my class.

name: Shenyl
description: Hi.I am Teacher Shenyl! I graduated at St. Peters College of Ormoc with a Degree of Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education Major in Gen. Science. I have experienced teaching Koreans and other nationalities. It is more fun in teaching English because you can share and mold others. Being an online teacher requires certain skills on how to manage your time and handle your class. Teaching English is difficult but it gives me the opportunity to share my knowledge and be able to know the culture of others. Learning English is very interesting. I do believe that everyone can learn and speak English with fun!
tags: Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education Major in General Science

name: Shy
description: Hello! My name is Teacher Shy. I studied a Bachelor of Secondary Education, major in English at Trinidad Municipal College. One of my strengths is being patient and always looking for the positive side. I am also a friendly person who can adapt quickly. I believe in the saying, Knowledge is power For me, learning English is not just about language-it is about building confidence and opening opportunities. I am excited to help my students learn, improve, and enjoy their English journey.

name: Spring(P)
description: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere. Hello! My name is Spring. I graduated from Trinidad Municipal College with a degree in Bachelor of Secondary Education, major in English. I am patient, creative, and passionate about helping students gain confidence in using English. I believe learning English opens the door to new opportunities and meaningful connections.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English

name: Stella
description: Hi, My name is teacher Stella and Im 23 years old. Im a graduate of Bachelor of Arts in English Language. I enjoy teaching because its always been my passion to share my knowledge to young minds. Teaching may be challenging, but knowing that I am able to help my students to achieve success is a great achievement for me as a teacher. NVOIM English insures nothing but an effective and fun leaning strategies. Come and join us in NVOIM!
tags: Bachelor of Arts in English Language

name: Stephen(M)
description: Hi! My name is Teacher Stephen, I graduated at Larmen De Guia Memorial College with the degree of BSED-English. I have been teaching working as private school teacher for six years. I have this passion for helping students develop their English communication skills with confidence.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English

name: Summer
description: Learning a language is not easy but I am here to help you to become knowledgeable in English. Hi! My name is Summer. I completed my degree in Elementary Education at Benedicto College. I have a talent for singing, dancing, and acting. I can make my teaching fun and exciting. I have experience in teaching English. I believe if you are committed to learning a language you will have a better future. Join me here at NVOIM and let us create memories together.
tags: Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in Content Education

name: Sunshine
description: Hello! I am Teacher Sunshine a graduate from Cebu Technological University with the degree of Bachelor of Technical Vocational in Teachers Education Major in Drafting Technology. I humbly claim to be an artistic, creative, and well-organized person. Teaching for me is a noble profession and it is my passion to teach my students with all my heart. Here at NVoim we make learning fun and engaging. Learning English as a second language will help you build strong connection with different people around the world. Letus join hands together and be part of our growing family. I hope to see you in my class.
tags: Bachelor of Technical Vocational in Teachers Education Major in Drafting Technology

name: Suzy
description: Hi there! I am Teacher Suzy. I took up a Bachelor of Secondary Education, Major in English. I enjoy reading books and writing poems. These hobbies help me stay creative and make learning more fun. Teaching is something I truly love. It gives me a sense of purpose and allows me to explore new things while helping others grow. I feel proud every time I see students learn and improve. My goal is to make learning fun and engaging, and to help you become more confident in using English, especially in speaking and writing. I am really excited to meet you all and grow together through this amazing learning journey. See you soon!
tags: University of Rizal System Cainta Campus
Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Syrine
description: Hello there! I am Teacher Syrine! I took up Bachelor of Secondary Education at the University of Cebu. I am fun of reading books during my free time and I also enjoy playing soccer baseball too. I chose the field of teaching because I believe that when you teach you do not only teach the concepts you also get the chance to transform their lives and seeing your students doing well is something that money cannot buy.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Filipino

name: Thea
description: Hello, dear students! I am Thea, and I took a Bachelors degree in Secondary Education majoring in English. My hobbies are singing, reading, and watching movies. I also enjoy crocheting. I have a deep passion for teaching because it allows me to connect with others, share my knowledge, and inspire a love of learning. It is incredibly rewarding to witness students growth and understanding, and to play a role in shaping their future. Im passionate about helping students build confidence and reach fluency in English, guiding them from the basics to advanced levels. I teach with a heart, and I am excited to learn and grow alongside you. Im looking forward to having class with you! See you!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Tophie
description: Hi! I am teacher Tophie. I was a former call center agent and experienced teaching in an ESL institution. I taught different nationalities both offline and online class. These experiences made me better in teaching English as a second language. I cannot wait to meeting you in class!
tags: Elementary Education major in General Education

name: Trish
description: A pleasant day to all of you! I am Trish, I took up Bachelor of Science in Secondary Education, Major in English, at National University. As an educator, I aim to bring light to my students and nurture them through teaching. At the same time, I enjoy reading self-help books and classic literature, as this helps improve my vocabulary and perception in life. To me, English is a powerful tool that helps people communicate, despite the language barriers that may hinder universal understanding. To help my students improve their skills, I will create a safe learning environment where they feel confident to express themselves. I plan to integrate interactive activities and a personalized plan to cater to their learning styles. I am excited to teach and meet my dear students! I look forward to being part of your educational journey. See you!
tags: Bachelor in Secondary Education Major in English

name: Vee
description: Hi my name is Vee. I finished my degree at Cebu Normal University majored in Biology. I ve been working as an ESL teacher for quite some time now. I ve been dealing with different kinds of people in the business and I always look forward meeting new in the future. I am passionate, considerate, patient and cheerful teacher and I am eager to assist you in learning the language. Learning English can be challenging but it can create many opportunities! Here at NVOIM we cater easy, fun and interactive way of learning. So, don t be afraid to learn English, come and join us and be part of our NVOIM family!
tags: Bachelor of Science Major in Biology

name: Venus
description: Do you want fun, easy, and interactive learning? Hi there! My name is Venus. I have finished my degree in education at the University of Southeastern University, Davao City, I majored in Home Economics. Teaching has been my passion ever since and so I have continued this career for more than 17 years now. Learning English is not as easy as 1, 2, and 3. It takes a lot of passion and focus for you to achieve your goal. So if you want to learn English, come and join us and I will be there every step of the way to help and guide you. See you in class!
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Technology and Home Economics

name: Vira
description: Hello! Good day! Iam teacher Vira, I graduated of Cebu Technological University with a Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English. As a teacher, my strength lies in building students confidence towards the English Language. I make innovative approaches exposing students to engaging in any fun activities. Focusing more on comprehension rather than perfection. Let us make your English learning journey unforgettable here at NVOIM.
tags: Bachelor of Secondary Education major in English

name: Yam
description: Hello! I am Teacher Yam. I am a graduate of Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Technology Livelihood Education. To teach is really my dream and to work here in NVoim is a dream come true to me. For me, teaching is not just a profession but also a passion.
tags: Cebu State College of Science and Technology
Bachelor of Secondary Education Major in Livelihood Education

name: Yen
description: Good day! I am Teacher Yen. I am 33 years old. I studied Bachelor of Elementary Education major in General Education in University of Cebu Lapu-Lapu and Mandaue. I have been teaching for 8 years for both offline and online class with different nationalities. One of the greatest strength is enthusiasm. I believe that people who are enthusiastic about their work one much more effective. I approach all tasks with enthusiasm, and I have found that this helps me exceed targets. And I thought about learning English, tell me and I forget, teach me and I remember, involve me and I learn. And here in NVOIM, you will surely be involved. See you in my class!
tags: University of Cebu Lapu-lapu and Mandaue
Bachelor of Elementary Education Major in General content

name: Yuri
description: Hello! I am Yuri. I graduated with the degree of Bachelor of Arts major in Political Science. Curiosity made me wonder that is why I engaged myself in Political Science and that is when my English journey began. I believe nothing is impossible with learning and practicing that started with curiosity. I love English because it is the language that guides me anywhere. And now I want to extend my knowledge to others who need it. Here at NVOIM, we will be your guide in achieving fluency in English. It will be an exciting journey to be with people who are eager to learn. Come on let us get curious about English together.

name: Zey
description: Hi! I am teacher Zey. I know that learning English is not easy as it requires time and effort to improve but in my class, I will help you to slowly adapt and learn the language at your own pace. I can assure you that we can easily get along since I have diverse experience in meeting foreign people. Let us achieve together your goal of learning English. see you online
tags: Bachelor Of Science in Industrial Engineering

name: Zia
description: Hello! I am Teacher Zia! I am passionate about teaching and helping students succeed in life. I strive hard to create fun and engaging classes to make learning English enjoyable. I am excited to help you improve your vocabulary and speaking skills. I am excited to meeting you in class
tags: Bachelor in Technology and Livelihood Education Major in Home Economics
